articles.author: Julianna Bragg
articles.title: $1 Trump coin: Treasury shares draft design for America's 250th - Axios
articles.description: A draft Trump $1 coin may clash with the law banning living presidents on U.S. money.
articles.content:
The U.S. may mint a $1 coin bearing President Trump's image for the 250th anniversary of America's independence, a Treasury spokesperson told Axios Friday.
Why it matters: Federal law generally proh… [+1542 chars]

articles.title: Karoline Leavitt says White House must cut spending due to shutdown - NPR
articles.description: White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt says the Trump administration has to look at ways to "save money in a responsible way that respects the American taxpayer's money" during shutdown.
articles.content: With the federal government in the third day of a shutdown, White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt says the Trump administration has no choice but to look at where it can make cuts to governmen… [+8019 chars]
